Package: io.vertx.groovy.ext.web.sstore

[Groovy] Class LocalSessionStore

      • io.vertx.groovy.ext.web.sstore.LocalSessionStore

      • A session store which is only available on a single node.

        Can be used when sticky sessions are being used.

            Returns:
            the session store
            Parameters:
            vertx - the Vert.x instance
            sessionMapName - name for map used to store sessions
            reaperPeriod - how often, in ms, to check for expired sessions
